languages.text: "Не было никакой Теодоры, ведьма". {n}Арджента смотрит прямо перед собой, а затем складывает руки на груди, осеняя себя святым знамением.{/n} "Был морок, и искушение, и скверна, что пыталась сбить нас от пути. Но {name} распознал{mf||а} их природу!"

traits.locale_text: "Не было никакой Теодоры, ведьма". {n}Арджента смотрит прямо перед собой, а затем складывает руки на груди, осеняя себя святым знамением.{/n} "Был морок, и искушение, и скверна, что пыталась сбить нас от пути. Но {name} распознал{mf||а} их природу!"

languages.text: "There was no Theodora, witch." {n}Argenta is staring straight ahead, then crosses her arms over her chest with reverence.{/n} "There was an illusion, a temptation, a foul taint that tried to lead us astray. But {name} perceived its true nature!"
languages.original_text: "Не было никакой Теодоры, ведьма". {n}Арджента смотрит прямо перед собой, а затем складывает руки на груди, осеняя себя святым знамением.{/n} "Был морок, и искушение, и скверна, что пыталась сбить нас от пути. Но {name} распознал{mf||а} их природу!"

traits.locale_text: "There was no Theodora, witch." {n}Argenta is staring straight ahead, then crosses her arms over her chest with reverence.{/n} "There was an illusion, a temptation, a foul taint that tried to lead us astray. But {name} perceived its true nature!"

"There was no Theodora, witch." {n}Argenta is staring straight ahead, then crosses her arms over her chest with reverence.{/n} "There was an illusion, a temptation, a foul taint that tried to lead us astray. But {name} perceived its true nature!"

"There was no Theodora, witch." {n}Argenta is staring straight ahead, then crosses her arms over her chest with reverence.{/n} "There was an illusion, a temptation, a foul taint that tried to lead us astray. But {name} perceived its true nature!"

"There was no Theodora, witch." {n}Argenta is staring straight ahead, then crosses her arms over her chest with reverence.{/n} "There was an illusion, a temptation, a foul taint that tried to lead us astray. But {name} perceived its true nature!"

"There was no Theodora, witch." {n}Argenta is staring straight ahead, then crosses her arms over her chest with reverence.{/n} "There was an illusion, a temptation, a foul taint that tried to lead us astray. But {name} perceived its true nature!"

languages.text: “刚刚根本没有什么西奥多拉，女巫。”{n}阿洁塔直直地看着前方，随后双手交叉放在胸前，满怀虔敬。{/n}“那仅仅是个幻觉，是个诱惑，是个卑劣的陷阱。它打算把我们引入歧途，但{name}看穿到了它的真面目！”
languages.original_text: "There was no Theodora, witch." {n}Argenta is staring straight ahead, then crosses her arms over her chest with reverence.{/n} "There was an illusion, a temptation, a foul taint that tried to lead us astray. But {name} perceived its true nature!"

traits.locale_text: “刚刚根本没有什么西奥多拉，女巫。”{n}阿洁塔直直地看着前方，随后双手交叉放在胸前，满怀虔敬。{/n}“那仅仅是个幻觉，是个诱惑，是个卑劣的陷阱。它打算把我们引入歧途，但{name}看穿到了它的真面目！”

languages.text: «Esa Theodora no era real, bruja». {n}Argenta mira directamente al frente y cruza los brazos sobre su pecho con reverencia.{/n} «Era una ilusión, una tentación, una traicionera corrupción que trataba de desviarnos de nuestro camino, pero ¡{name} ha percibido su verdadera naturaleza!».
languages.original_text: "There was no Theodora, witch." {n}Argenta is staring straight ahead, then crosses her arms over her chest with reverence.{/n} "There was an illusion, a temptation, a foul taint that tried to lead us astray. But {name} perceived its true nature!"

traits.locale_text: «Esa Theodora no era real, bruja». {n}Argenta mira directamente al frente y cruza los brazos sobre su pecho con reverencia.{/n} «Era una ilusión, una tentación, una traicionera corrupción que trataba de desviarnos de nuestro camino, pero ¡{name} ha percibido su verdadera naturaleza!».

languages.text: 「魔女よ、シオドーラ様はいなかった」{n}アルジェンタはまっすぐ前を見つめ、敬意を込めて胸の上で腕を交差させる。{/n}「我らを迷わせようとする幻想、誘惑、不潔な汚れがあったが、{name}さんはその本質を見抜いた！」
languages.original_text: "There was no Theodora, witch." {n}Argenta is staring straight ahead, then crosses her arms over her chest with reverence.{/n} "There was an illusion, a temptation, a foul taint that tried to lead us astray. But {name} perceived its true nature!"

traits.locale_text: 「テオドラはいなかった、魔女」 {n}アルジェンタはまっすぐ前を見つめ、敬意を込めて胸の上で腕を交差させる。{/n}「私たちを迷わせようとする幻想、誘惑、不潔な汚れがあったが、{name}私はその本質を認識した！」
「魔女よ、シオドーラ様はいなかった」{n}アルジェンタはまっすぐ前を見つめ、敬意を込めて胸の上で腕を交差させる。{/n}「我らを迷わせようとする幻想、誘惑、不潔な汚れがあったが、{name}さんはその本質を見抜いた！」

languages.original_text: "There was no Theodora, witch." {n}Argenta is staring straight ahead, then crosses her arms over her chest with reverence.{/n} "There was an illusion, a temptation, a foul taint that tried to lead us astray. But  perceived its true nature!"

languages.text: « Théodora n'était pas là, sorcière. » {n}Argenta regarde droit devant elle, puis croise les bras sur sa poitrine avec respect.{/n} « Ce n'était qu'une illusion, une tentation, une souillure infâme qui a cherché à nous égarer. Mais {name} a su percevoir sa vraie nature ! »
languages.original_text: "There was no Theodora, witch." {n}Argenta is staring straight ahead, then crosses her arms over her chest with reverence.{/n} "There was an illusion, a temptation, a foul taint that tried to lead us astray. But {name} perceived its true nature!"

traits.locale_text: « Théodora n'était pas là, sorcière. » {n}Argenta regarde droit devant elle, puis croise les bras sur sa poitrine avec respect.{/n} « Ce n'était qu'une illusion, une tentation, une souillure infâme qui a cherché à nous égarer. Mais {name} a su percevoir sa vraie nature ! »

languages.text: "Da war keine Theodora, Hexe." {n}Argenta starrt geradeaus und verschränkt dann ehrfürchtig die Arme.{/n} "Da war eine Illusion, eine Versuchung, ein fauler Makel, der uns in die Irre leiten wollte. Aber {name} hat seine wahre Natur erkannt!"
languages.original_text: "There was no Theodora, witch." {n}Argenta is staring straight ahead, then crosses her arms over her chest with reverence.{/n} "There was an illusion, a temptation, a foul taint that tried to lead us astray. But {name} perceived its true nature!"

traits.locale_text: "Da war keine Theodora, Hexe." {n}Argenta starrt geradeaus und verschränkt dann ehrfürchtig die Arme.{/n} "Da war eine Illusion, eine Versuchung, ein fauler Makel, der uns in die Irre leiten wollte. Aber {name} hat seine wahre Natur erkannt!"

languages.text: "Theodora falan yoktu cadı." {n}Argenta, hürmet göstergesi olarak gözlerini tam önüne dikip kollarını göğsünün üzerinde kavuşturuyor.{/n} "Bir yanılsama, kandırmaca, menfur bir yozluk bizi yolumuzdan çıkarmaya çalıştı lakin {name}, onun asıl tabiatını sezdi!"
languages.original_text: "There was no Theodora, witch." {n}Argenta is staring straight ahead, then crosses her arms over her chest with reverence.{/n} "There was an illusion, a temptation, a foul taint that tried to lead us astray. But {name} perceived its true nature!"

traits.locale_text: "Theodora falan yoktu cadı." {n}Argenta, hürmet göstergesi olarak gözlerini tam önüne dikip kollarını göğsünün üzerinde kavuşturuyor.{/n} "Bir yanılsama, kandırmaca, menfur bir yozluk bizi yolumuzdan çıkarmaya çalıştı lakin {name}, onun asıl tabiatını sezdi!"
